alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 3:08PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Concordia, south central Catahoula Parishes in northeastern Louisiana and north central Adams Counties through 400 PM CST... At 307 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Monterey, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Frogmore around 320 PM CST. Ferriday around 325 PM CST. West Ferriday around 330 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Ridgecrest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for northeastern Louisiana.
